VelocityTools 3.1 API

Packages 
Package Description
org.apache.velocity.tools  
org.apache.velocity.tools.config  
org.apache.velocity.tools.examples.showcase  
org.apache.velocity.tools.examples.showcase.sample  
org.apache.velocity.tools.examples.showcase.tool  
org.apache.velocity.tools.examples.simple.tool  
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic
Contains a collection of reusable, general-purpose "tools" for Velocity.
org.apache.velocity.tools.view
Contains tools and supporting infrastructure for using those tools in a servlet environment as well as general use classes to support use of Velocity as (or in) the view layer of web applications.
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.jsp
JSP support of Velocity (and vice-versa).
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.jsp.jspimpl
Contains JSP-simulating classes that allows the use of a Velocity environment under JSP specific classes, like tags.
